name: Language Barrier (MAGES Institute of Excellence)
description:
Wanna learn some basic Japanese? Well, now you…kinda can? Welcome to Language Barrier where you play as a foreigner entering a Japanese game show. This game is an escape room where you must find the translation for the objects you are interacting with. To escape, you must answer questions by translating the words on the screen with the translation you have on hand.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

This game was developed over a 6-week period by DGDT Student Chan Min Feng as part of the Basic Game Programming Module.

Japanese Audio from Google Translate / Jisho.org / JapanDict
